svc@... wrote:

> Is there a reason why heritrix is still bundled with an old version of
> jetty (4.2.21).
> The latest jetty version is 5.1.2 (released januar 20th).

Hey S�ren:

Jetty 4.x implements the servlet 2.3 spec. and jsp 1.2.  Jetty 5.x does 
servlet 2.4 and jsp 2.0.  We should upgrade some day but its not a 
priority.  In general, our servlet and jsp usage pattern is basic; we've 
not had need of newer spec. features, not thus far (This might change 
when we go to deploy in other containers).  Would be great if someone 
sent us a patch.

Meantime, I upgraded our jetty to use the latest 4.x release.

Thanks S�ren,
St.Ack
